Topic.Title: can i customize choice buttons and text backgrounds in gamebook mode?

Posts.EditableText:
Hello, i've just started to use Quest, i am still a newbie, but my question here is: there is anyway to change the choice text for an image? And can i use a background that looks like an old paper sheet?

Quest is really anazing.
